created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the entity was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the entity's most recent update

offering_uid.description: Unique identifier for the parent bundled of items

bundled_offering_uid.description: Unique identifier for the bundled item

description: A bundled offering is an offering that is sold together with another offering. When the parent offering is purchased, the bundled offering is also included in the purchase. This list does not include bundled staff seats
